title: Verify Customer Age for Restricted Product
description: A customer is trying to purchase an age-restricted item (e.g., wine, a rated video game) and must have their age verified.

tasks.description: When an age-restricted item is added to the cart, prompt the user for their date of birth.
tasks.expected_outcome: System displays an age verification prompt.

tasks.description: Use a third-party service to verify that the customer's name and date of birth indicate they are of legal age.
tasks.expected_outcome: The verification service returns a 'pass' status.

tasks.description: If verification passes, allow the checkout to proceed. If it fails, block the purchase and display a message.
tasks.expected_outcome: System correctly allows or blocks the transaction based on the verification result.
